trends: There have been 24 other sightings in Las Cruces
There were no other sightings in Las Cruces on or around December 25th 2009
divs: Sighting Details"Narrative below was submitted by MUFON Dispatch for witness based on phone conversation with witness." Witness was driving on his way to California about an hour outside Las Cruces, New Mexico when at approximately 10:55 am he spotted an undefined black object hovering in the southern sky. Witness had a difficult time trying to describe any shape to the object and could not estimate the distance of the object from him or its elevation. He said he had been watching it for about 30 minutes and it was still visible while he was reporting it to dispatch.
